full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO ZHAL BCU GCIG PA DPAL MO'I LUGS KYI SGRUB THABS SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA DANG BCAS PA PHAN BDE'I SNANG BA GSAR DANG MA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @023B (CES 'PHAGS PA THUGS RJE CHEN PO ZHAL BCU GCIG PA GRUB DBANG DPAL MO'I LUGS KYI SGRUB THABS @024A *, ,SMYUNG BAR GNAS PA'I CHO GA BYA TSUL DANG BCAS PA PHAN BDE'I SNANG BA GSAR GDOD MI ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA HU THOG TU DANG, STAG PHU SPRUL SKU BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN, CHOS 'KHOR RGYAL MKHAN ZUR SKU SKYE BAR 'BYAMS PA BSKAL BZANG RAB RGYAS, LHA LDAN SPRO BDE KHANG GSAR BA'I DKAR PO PHYOGS BRGYAD PA SPYI TSOGS DANG, 'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG PA AOR DU SU PE SE RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I SHOG BKA' BCU KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO, ,BDE YANGS RAB 'BYAMS PA BSKAL BANG RAB RGYAS, ,LHA LDAN SPRO BDE KHANG GSAR BA'I DKAR PO PHYOGS BRGYAD PA SPYI TSOGS DANG, ,'BRAS SPUNGS SGO MANG PA AOR DU SU PE SE RNAM RGYAL RDO RJE'I SHOG BKA' BCU KLU SGRUB RGYA MTSO, ,BDE YANGS RAB 'BYAMS PA BLO BZANG NOR BU SOGS NAS BSKUL MA RIM PAR BYUNG BAR BRTEN BRTZOM 'DUN THOG NYE CHAR KHAL KHA NAS DANG STOBS DANG LDAN PA KHE PE'I AAM PANG SE TSE MCHOG SKYABS KYIS BSKUL MA BYUNG BAR BRTEN, ,DPAL MGON 'PHAGS PA KLU SGRUB DANG, ,GRUB BRNYES DPAL MOS MDZAD PA'I RGYA GZHUNG SOGS LA GZHIGS, ,GTZO CHEN PHYAG NA PADMA THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DGE 'DUN RGYA MTSOS MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS 'JUG PA'I BDE BAR BRTEN DAR PO CHE BAR 'DUG PAS DE NYID GZHIN BZUNG, ,MKHAS GRUB TSAD LDAN GZHAN GYIS MDZAD PA'I CHO GA DANG, ,DAM PA' PHYAG BZHES SOGS NAS, ,KHA 'GENG 'OS KYIS LEGS PAR BRGYAN TE, ,^ SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG SKAL BZANG RGYA MTSOS 'PHAGS PA 'JIG RTEN DBANG PHYUG GI PHO BRANG PO TA 'KHA'I GZIMS CHUNG NYI 'OD 'KHYIL BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAR KHAN DGE LSONG BSKAL BZANG YON TAN GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,)
